title: Kisanga - John (Print)
description: Ila (Chiila) is a language of Zambia. Maho (2009) lists Lundwe (Shukulumbwe) and Sala as distinct languages most closely related to Ila.

language.name: Sanga (Democratic Republic of Congo)
language.area: Katanga Province, north of Likasi, widely dispersed in Lubudi, Mitwaba, and Pweto territories.
